shortDescription: Always the hunter. Never the hunted.

dialogues.message: What do you need to know?
We made peace with the River Guard a while back... but I don't trust it.
After all, you can stitch up a wound, but the scar remains.
Still. If they've decided to put the war behind us, maybe we can have peace.
I'll believe it when I see it.
Fox Clan used to have magical masks, many ages ago.
A family of artisans from this Island knew the secret to making them. But they got overambitious.
They created dangerous Masks of Power, which caused the Shattering War.
Magic was banished. Masks were shattered. And, of course, Fox Clan was blamed.
Fox Clan have survived a lot of rough times. Made dangerous enemies.
And now, we're back where it all began. Right here.
Demons, magical masks, it's like the old stories are coming to life.
Those stories didn't go great for us, the first time 'round.
Keep your eyes peeled. Enemies might be lurking.
Greetings from the Fox Clan.
Keep your eyes peeled. Enemies might be lurking.
You never know what stalks the shadows...
Are you on Fox Clan business?
Empress. I'm not looking for any trouble.
I told you. You pick up strays, you have to train 'em.
Drift's not here, little kit. Go play somewhere else.
I'm hearing rumors of magic masks. That means trouble.
I'm worried about these masks, guardian.
What are the poets saying about us, Voxy?
I just hope you're not like your foolish ancestors.

shortDescription: Iconic renegade on a mission for retribution.

dialogues.message: What?
Hope and I are looking for something.
... That's all you're getting.
I guess change doesn't always stick.
Hey. It's you again.
I guess change doesn't always stick.
I'm on a mission.
When you're in a suspicious mood, everyone seems supicious.
Magic. Huh.
I like the new look. Very "parkour".
You're not telling us everything.
Real life isn't a story, buddy.
Hm. What did curiosity do to the cat again?
Just try me, demon.
Are you sure you're in the right place? I have a specific clientele.
Hm. What brings someone like... you... to The Thousand Faces?
Are you sure you're in the right place? I have a specific clientele.
100% off all non-magical masks. We're done with those.
What do you want?
What's today's adventure then?
Hm. I don't know you... and I know everyone.
Stay out of my business, stranger, and I'll stay out of yours.
What would you like to know?
People cannot cross into the Spirit Realm. Only demons.
I'll admit, I have a burning curiosity to see that world.
What ancient secrets it may be keeping...
But even I can't cross the threshold. Yet.
Kendo styles himself as a warrior of old, but he's just restless and bored.
He seeks some great purpose... Fool. We make our own purpose.
Jade is reckless, but brilliant. Maybe the smartest person I've met, aside from myself.
She'll change this world, if she doesn't destroy herself in the process.
As the eldest son, I inherited the shop from my grandfather.
Once upon a time, we made great, magical Masks of Power.
But my ancestors burned the secrets to crafting them.
I've unlocked rudimentary mask magic, but if I could make a true Mask of Power...
What are you curious about?
The sprites are somehow connected to the magic of this Island. It's fascinating.
If you can bring me a sprite, you'll be rewarded. I'd love to see one of those little guys up close!
Everyone says the old stories are about war.
But they aren't. Not really. They're about BALANCE.
When the Island is in balance, things are amazing.
The Island isn't in balance, right now. I want to fix that.
My brother Kendo is a warrior without a teacher.
He loves magic, and stories of noble warriors.
He thinks I'm reckless. I think he's naive. We... argue.
But he's got the purest heart I know. I hope it's enough...
My eldest brother Daigo is a... frustrated genius.
He hates that our family only makes ceremonial, non-magical masks.
The old stories say, magical masks led to the banishment of magic.
He's my favorite person... but he's really stubborn. And maybe dangerous.
This Island is special. It needs protection.
Hey. I'm Jade. Are you new around here?
This Island is special. It needs protection.
I want to see every nook and cranny of this whole Island!
My brothers don't understand. It's all about balance.
I keep being stalked by demons. Ha! As if that will scare me.
The sprites... I can feel a special connection with them. It's beautiful.
Stop trying to protect me. I'm in charge of my story, not you.
They'll tell stories of you someday, brother. Make them good ones.
You deserve your freedom. Everyone does.
Is that... Helsie?? Wow. It's been ages.
Friendfriend have question? Bushy have answer... maybe.
Nightday odd in thisplace. Rules different. Nature strange.
Bushy can talk to spritefriends. Help sun come home. Wake up forest!
Bushy always happy to help friendfriend and forest.
Nightday weird here. Bushy can help!
Bushybushy forest guardian!
Nightday weird here. Bushy can help!
Dayforest has sunshine! Thank the spritefriends!
Bushy protect forest for newfriend Jade!
Bushy won't let demons mess with forest!

shortDescription: The depth of the ocean. The rage of the storm.

dialogues.message: What has the current brought me, hm?
The River Guard welcomes you. If you do not try our patience.
What has the current brought me, hm?
Welcome to River Guard's domain. At least, part of it.
You will not find your purpose here, warrior.
They call you reckless. I prefer relentless, like the tide.
You swim dark waters, mask maker. Beware they don't drown you.
What you seek is here, yet... not here. Good luck.
We have no quarrel with the Fox Clan... for now.
Keep your eyes sharp, brother. Darkness stirs beneath the surface.
Watch yourself, little fox.
The heart of the ocean beats within you, dragon warrior.
What would you like to know?
These magical masks stink of old, dangerous magic.
The very magic we waged a war to destroy.
Of course they are useful. But power has a cost.
Feel free to pay it. I, myself, will abstain.
The Fox Clan are not malicious, but... they have made mistakes.
Long ago, their mask maker forged masks of ruinous power.
Even once they realized their folly, it almost tore this Island apart.
Magic was banished, to protect us. And now... it has returned.
Ever since some... unfortunate history, the River Guard keep to ourselves.
Trust, once broken, is not easily mended.
Once upon a time, an ambitious artisan chased power, and a war erupted.
The lessons learned have been forgotten. The reminder will be sharp.

shortDescription: A wandering rōnin with a restless spirit.

dialogues.message: This Island sure is beautiful, isn't it?
Nice to meet you.
This Island is beautiful. I'm proud to protect it.
Never thought I'd get to see real magic...
I don't need another lecture, brother.
Be careful, Jade. You're going to get yourself hurt.
What do you want, demon?
Don't worry, Hope. I have your back.
What would you like to know?
My whole life, I've felt like there is some great purpose awaiting me.
I've always looked up to the warriors of old. Their skill, their honor.
If I'd had a true master, perhaps I could be this Island's protector...
But until then, I guess I'm waiting for my destiny to begin.
Jade's a marvel. A whirlwind of energy and insight.
Nobody knows this Island, or has found as many of its secrets, as Jade.
But she's... reckless. And burdened by a duty she puts on herself.
If she's not careful... but I hate to think about that.
Daigo is my eldest brother, a mask maker of some repute.
He inherited the family mask shop, The Thousand Faces.
He is brilliant... and selfish, and overambitious, and...
We don't get along. But we love each other.
Keep your eyes peeled for... creatures of the night!!
Heya! How can the High Stakes Club help you out?
Keep your eyes peeled for... creatures of the night!!
Watch out for demons out there!
I'm used to vampires and monsters, but demons?? That's new.
Stake holstered and eyes on a swivel!
Demons, sprites, magic... it's just like in the old stories.
I can't believe we're seeing actual, real magic!!
We're surrounded by actual magic. How cool is that??
Remember to take care of yourself too, Lucien.
Jade!! It's been ages. How've you been?
High Stakes Club is happy to help with your... artifact search?
What would ya like to know??
The gang's still kicking! Me, Lucien, Joni...
For pretty much forever, we've operated in the shadows.
Nobody believed us that vampires and monsters existed!
But I guess they can't really argue if demons exist when they're so... everywhere.
Yo.
Hey.
Yo.
Sup.
You good?
Mrow.
*coughs* Ugh, hairball.
You been practicing those wall kicks like I showed you?
You could probably climb pretty fast with... those arms...
Uh, wow, you are... definitely a big cat.
So, new best friend, what's this about a golden touch?
What's up, big cat?
Every year, both sides of the canyon town race to see who can cross the canyon fastest.
The winner gets free buns for a year. And their side of the canyon gets bragging rights.
Let's say I've won MULTIPLE times...
Twice. I've, uh... I've won twice.

shortDescription: Dive into the heart of the dragon.

dialogues.message: May the seas always carry you home.
May the sea dragon keep you.
May the seas always carry you home.
May you be blessed by the sun, the moon and the waves.
I see the restless warrior in you. You will find your purpose.
What would you like to know?
I am duty-bound to help all creatures of the sea who need assistance.
This great turtle is afflicted with darkness and loneliness both.
If the darkness can be removed... well, I must focus on that first.
But if I could also help this turtle locate his lost love, my duty would be complete.
I carry the heart of the lost sea dragon within me.
What does that mean? Honestly... I am not totally sure.
I am duty-bound to carry out the dragon's oaths, and search for its lost bones.
I am sworn to it, and that purpose gives me comfort.

shortDescription: All it takes is one little spark.

dialogues.message: Call me Cinder. You know, the start of a flame.
Lets. Burn. SOME. RUBBER!
Call me Cinder. You know, the start of a flame.
I'm a bit of a wildfire.
Burn fast and LIGHT UP THE NIGHT!
I ride by the light of all the bridges I've burned.
Outfit reaction.
What do you want to know?
Jones and I are searching for... something, in this reality.
I can't say much, but it's.. like Pandora's Box.
That's as much as I can tell you, at least for now.
Because I don't think Jones and I are the only ones looking for it.
Yeah, I'm... trying to figure out who I am. And who I want to be.
Does The Underground define me? Does The Society? My name? My art?
What's out there for me, beyond painting the future and squaring up with megalomaniacal bullies?
I'm, uh... figuring it all out. And Jones is helping.
This is my first time hopping to a new reality with Jones.
I've never been this far from home before. It's... a lot.
This world is so beautiful and magical and... I'm a little overwhelmed.
I guess every new thing is a little scary at first.
Where could it be...?
Hey. Been a minute.
Where could it be...?
Keep your eyes out for... those sprite things.
This place is kind of amazing.
You're very casual about this whole 'reality-hopping' stuff.
We make a good team. At least for demon hunting.
My gut tell me not to trust you. My gut's rarely wrong.
